page.title: 02A Day in the Life of Sharon
page.content: Page 1 On Saturday I get up about 7.45am.I get up this early because I have to go to music school. For my breakfast I have a cup of tea. I leave my house at 8.45am.I walk to a school at the end of our street and a bus comes and picks me up at 9.00am. The journey is about fifteen minutes. When we reach Minsthorpe we get our instruments out. After all the chairs and stands have been set out my teacher, Miss Dale,tunes all our instruments, which takes about another fifteen minutes,then we begin to play. We play until 10.30am, then we have a break for thirty minutes in which I buy a cup of coffee, then I have a walk round and go look at the horse in the field.
